casebody.data:
98-1804 (La.App. 3 Cir. 6/2/99)

NATIONAL UNION FIRE INSURANCE COMPANY OF PITTSBURGH, PA, et al., Plaintiff-Appellee, v. James A. WALKER, Defendant-Appellant. No. 98-1804. Court of Appeal of Louisiana, Third Circuit. June 2, 1999. BEFORE DOUCET, C.J., COOKS and PICKETT, Judges. PER CURIAM.

In light of the Louisiana Supreme Court’s decision in Al Johnson Construction Company, et al. v. Pitre, 98-2564 (La.5/18/99); 734 So.2d 623 overruling its prior decision in Garrett v. Seventh Ward General Hosp., 95-0017 (La.9/22/95); 660 So.2d 841, we reverse the judgment rendered by the Workers’ Compensation Judge and remand this case solely for hearing and ruling on the employer’s re*586verse offset claim under La.R.S. 23:1225(A).

Reversed and Remanded.
